skuid__text.contents: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this data source condition? You can't undo this.
By default, all conditions will be enforced on query. However, custom logic can be used to allow for results to be returned if only some conditions are met.

skuid__messageBlock.title: Review and update your condition logic
skuid__messageBlock.description: Renaming, creating, or deleting conditions can lead to your condition logic to be out of date.

skuid__text.contents: Enforce on: Query{{#execute_on_insert}}{{#execute_on_update}}{{#execute_on_delete}}, {{/execute_on_delete}}{{/execute_on_update}}{{/execute_on_insert}}{{#execute_on_insert}}{{#execute_on_update}}{{^execute_on_delete}}, {{/execute_on_delete}}{{/execute_on_update}}{{/execute_on_insert}}{{#execute_on_insert}}{{^execute_on_update}}{{#execute_on_delete}}, {{/execute_on_delete}}{{/execute_on_update}}{{/execute_on_insert}}{{^execute_on_insert}}{{#execute_on_update}}{{#execute_on_delete}}, {{/execute_on_delete}}{{/execute_on_update}}{{/execute_on_insert}}{{^execute_on_insert}}{{^execute_on_update}}{{#execute_on_delete}} and {{/execute_on_delete}}{{/execute_on_update}}{{/execute_on_insert}}{{^execute_on_insert}}{{#execute_on_update}}{{^execute_on_delete}} and {{/execute_on_delete}}{{/execute_on_update}}{{/execute_on_insert}}{{#execute_on_insert}}{{^execute_on_update}}{{^execute_on_delete}} and {{/execute_on_delete}}{{/execute_on_update}}{{/execute_on_insert}}{{#execute_on_insert}}Insert{{#execute_on_update}}{{#execute_on_delete}}, {{/execute_on_delete}}{{/execute_on_update}}{{#execute_on_update}}{{^execute_on_delete}} and {{/execute_on_delete}}{{/execute_on_update}}{{^execute_on_update}}{{#execute_on_delete}} and {{/execute_on_delete}}{{/execute_on_update}}{{/execute_on_insert}}{{#execute_on_update}}Update{{#execute_on_delete}} and {{/execute_on_delete}}{{/execute_on_update}}{{#execute_on_delete}}Delete{{/execute_on_delete}}
Are you sure you want to permanently delete this data source condition? You can't undo this.
You haven't created a condition yet.
Data source conditions are used to either limit incoming data anytime a data source is queried or enforce field values when creating new records or updating existing records.

Data source conditions are used to either limit incoming data anytime a data source is queried or enforce field values when creating new records or updating existing records. 

Enforce on Query
Whenever this data source is queried, it will only display data that matches the rules of this condition.
Useful for filtering records. 

Enforce on Insert
Whenever a new record is created, the field for that record will match the value of the condition.
Particularly useful for Created By <User> fields

Enforce on Update
Whenever an end user modifies an existing record, the condition will be enforced. Meaning that, whether the user changes or removes a field’s value, Skuid will not update the record unless it matches the condition's value.

Enforce on Delete
Whenever an end user deletes an existing record, the condition will be enforced. Meaning that, Skuid will not delete the record unless the field matches the condition’s value.

Before an existing record is deleted in the database, ensure field {{field}} matches{{#value}}{{#is_user_info}} user’s{{/is_user_info}} {{value}}{{/value}}{{^value}} null{{/value}}
